long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Simplest and Most Reliable Way to Grow Followers with IGGrowth.

IGGrowth can automatically follow users for you and unfollow those who are not following you back.
Grow your Instagram followers using the auto Follow-Unfollow growth hack and help you save time.
Increase your Instagram followers effortlessly.

Grow your account, expand your reach, build your brand, and get more leads organically.

🚀 Features
✓ Auto Follow any user's followers and followings from Instagram
✓ Follow owners of posts for any IG hashtag or location
✓ Follow likers/commenters on photos/videos
✓ Follow/Unfollow custom users
✓ Unfollow who are not following you back
✓ Support Follow/Unfollow History.

📌 Strategies to Prevent Being Restricted
- Followed/unfollowed 5 users with a 10~15 pause mode
- Customize the number of follows/unfollows and the pause duration in the settings

📃 How to get started?
1. Select Follow Type
2. Enter the corresponding Username, Hashtag, Location ID, Post Link, or Custom Users
3. Click 'Start Following' Button

📬 FAQ
https://ig-growth.convertinsight.com/#faq
Encountering issues? Email us directly at convertscc@gmail.com.

🔒 Data Privacy
Your data's security is our top priority. Rest assured, all data remains on your device, ensuring 100% privacy and trustworthiness.

📢 Statement
This extension is designed to reduce repetitive work. Excessive spam activity may result in your IG account being banned. IG limits vary by account, so we limit processing time and the number of follows and unfollows to ensure seamless operation.

⭐ About Pro
IGGrowth is a paid extension, you can follow/unfollow the first 6 users of each day for free trial.

🥰 We hope you enjoy using IGGrowth as much as we enjoyed creating it for you!
